parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Portname
parameter.description: Serial port to use connecting to the metering device e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: baudRateChangeDelay
parameter.label: Baud rate change delay
parameter.description: Delay of baud rate change in ms. Default is 0. USB to serial converters often require a delay of up to 250ms default is 0ms.

parameter.name: echoHandling
parameter.label: Echo handling
parameter.description: Enable handling of echos caused by some optical tranceivers. Default value is true.

parameter.name: initMessage
parameter.label: Extra pre init bytes
parameter.description: extra pre init bytes. Default value is empty.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Meter refresh rate
parameter.description: Refresh rate in [s] to query the meter data.
